description:
The world looks on as Paruko delivers a live broadcast of a historic battle. Kyoya challenges Tasuku and Gaito to a two-on-one Buddyfight, with the newly-completed Dragon Drei card as the stakes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gachi Shock! Dragon Drei Kyoui no Chikara!!
Massive Shock! Dragon Drei`s Amazing Power!
ガチショック! ドラゴン・ドライ驚異の力!!
